37 typedef pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI> PointCloud;
38 PointCloud blob;
39 bool newCloud = false;
40 void callback(const PointCloud::ConstPtr& msg){
41  pcl::copyPointCloud(*msg, blob);
42  newCloud = true;
43 }
44 
45 void dynamicCallback(nimbus_cloud::searchRadiusConfig &config, uint32_t level){
46  _ns = config.normal_sr_;
47  _ks = config.keypoint_sr_;
48  _ds = config.descriptor_sr_;
49  rf_rad_ = config.rf_rad_;
50  cg_size_ = config.cg_size_;
51  cg_thresh_ = config.cg_thresh_;
52 }
53 
54 void visualization (const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr model,
55  const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr scene,
56  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > rototranslations,
57  std::vector<pcl::Correspondences> clustered_corrs,
58  nimbus::cloudRecognition<pcl::PointXYZI, pcl::Normal> recog){
59  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer viewer("Correspondence");
60  viewer.addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI> (scene, "scene_cloud");
61 
62  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr off_scene_model (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI> ());
63  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr off_scene_model_keypoints (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI> ());
64 
65  pcl::transformPointCloud(*model, *off_scene_model, Eigen::Vector3f (-1,0,0), Eigen::Quaternionf (1, 0, 0, 0));
66  pcl::transformPointCloud (*recog.mData.keypoint, *off_scene_model_keypoints, Eigen::Vector3f (-1,0,0), Eigen::Quaternionf (1, 0, 0, 0));
67 
68  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZI> off_scene_model_color_handler (off_scene_model, 255, 255, 128);
69  viewer.addPointCloud (off_scene_model, off_scene_model_color_handler, "off_scene_model");
70 
71  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZI> scene_keypoints_color_handler (recog.keypointOut, 0, 0, 255);
72  viewer.addPointCloud (recog.keypointOut, scene_keypoints_color_handler, "scene_keypoints");
73  viewer.setPointCloudRenderingProperties (pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, 5, "scene_keypoints");
74 
75  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZI> off_scene_model_keypoints_color_handler (off_scene_model_keypoints, 0, 0, 255);
76  viewer.addPointCloud (off_scene_model_keypoints, off_scene_model_keypoints_color_handler, "off_scene_model_keypoints");
77  viewer.setPointCloudRenderingProperties (pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_POINT_SIZE, 5, "off_scene_model_keypoints");
78 
79  for(std::size_t i = 0; i < rototranslations.size(); i++)
80  {
81  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr rotated_model (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
82  pcl::transformPointCloud (*model, *rotated_model, rototranslations[i]);
83 
84  std::stringstream ss_cloud;
85  ss_cloud << "instance" << i;
86 
87  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerCustom<pcl::PointXYZI> rotated_model_color_handler (rotated_model, 255, 0, 0);
88  viewer.addPointCloud (rotated_model, rotated_model_color_handler, ss_cloud.str ());
89 
90  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < clustered_corrs[i].size (); ++j)
91  {
92  std::stringstream ss_line;
93  ss_line << "correspondence_line" << i << "_" << j;
94  pcl::PointXYZI& model_point = off_scene_model_keypoints->at (clustered_corrs[i][j].index_query);
95  pcl::PointXYZI& scene_point = recog.keypointOut->at (clustered_corrs[i][j].index_match);
96 
97  // We are drawing a line for each pair of clustered correspondences found between the model and the scene
98  viewer.addLine<pcl::PointXYZI, pcl::PointXYZI> (model_point, scene_point, 0, 255, 0, ss_line.str ());
99  }
100  }
101  viewer.spinOnce(10000, false);
102 }
103 
104 int main(int argc, char** argv){
105  ros::init(argc, argv, "nimbus_node");
106  ros::NodeHandle nh;
107  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe<PointCloud>("/nimbus/pointcloud", 10, callback);
108  ros::Publisher pub = nh.advertise<PointCloud>("filtered_cloud", 5);
109  ros::Publisher pubPose = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::Transform>("pose_detection", 5);
110 
111  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<nimbus_cloud::searchRadiusConfig> server;
112  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<nimbus_cloud::searchRadiusConfig>::CallbackType dF;
113  dF = boost::bind(&dynamicCallback, _1, _2);
114  server.setCallback(dF);
115 
116  static tf2_ros::StaticTransformBroadcaster staticTrans;
117 
118  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr model(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
119  pcl::io::loadPCDFile("/home/vishnu/ros_ws/catkin_nim_ws/src/nimbus_cloud/test/model1.pcd", *model);
120  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr scene (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
121  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr scene_blob (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
122 
123  cloudMean<pcl::PointXYZI> cMean(nh);
124  nimbus::cloudRecognition<pcl::PointXYZI, pcl::Normal> cRecog(nh);
125 
126  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped cameraPose;
127  cameraPose.child_frame_id = "detection";
128  cameraPose.header.frame_id = "world";
129  cameraPose.transform.translation.x = 0;
130  cameraPose.transform.translation.y = 0;
131  cameraPose.transform.translation.z = 1;
132  tf2::Quaternion q;
133  q.setRPY(-1.57, 1.57, 0);
134  cameraPose.transform.rotation.x = q.x();
135  cameraPose.transform.rotation.y = q.y();
136  cameraPose.transform.rotation.z = q.z();
137  cameraPose.transform.rotation.w = q.w();
138 
139  geometry_msgs::Transform pose;
140 
141  while (ros::ok())
142  {
143  cRecog.updateParm(_ns, _ks, _ds, rf_rad_, cg_size_, cg_thresh_);
144  if(cMean.cloudQueue.size() < 100){
145  cMean.cloudQueue.enqueue(blob);
146  newCloud = false;
147  }else{
148  cRecog.modelConstruct(model);
149  cMean.meanFilter(*scene_blob, blob.width, blob.height);
150  cRecog.remover(scene_blob, blob.width, blob.height, 0.55, 0.55, *scene);
151  scene->is_dense = false;
152  // Clustering
153  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > rototranslations;
154  std::vector<pcl::Correspondences> clustered_corrs;
155  if(!scene->points.size() == 0)cRecog.cloudHough3D(scene, rototranslations, clustered_corrs);
156  std::cout << "Model instances found: " << rototranslations.size () << std::endl;
157  if(!rototranslations.size() == 0) visualization(model, scene, rototranslations, clustered_corrs, cRecog);
158  for(std::size_t i = 0; i < rototranslations.size(); ++i){
159  std::cout << "\n Instance " << i+1 << ":" << std::endl;
160  std::cout << " Correspondences belonging to this instance: " << clustered_corrs[i].size () << std::endl;
161  //std::cout << " Scale: " << scale[i] << std::endl;
162 
163  Eigen::Matrix3f rotation = rototranslations[i].block<3,3>(0,0);
164  Eigen::Vector3f translation = rototranslations[i].block<3,1>(0, 3);
165  tf2::Matrix3x3 mat(rotation (0,0), rotation (0,1), rotation (0,2),
166  rotation (1,0), rotation (1,1), rotation (1,2),
167  rotation (2,0), rotation (2,1), rotation (2,2));
168  tf2Scalar roll, pitch, yaw;
169  mat.getEulerYPR(yaw, pitch, roll);
170  tf2::Quaternion q;
171  q.setRPY(roll, pitch, yaw);
172  pose.translation.x = translation(0);
173  pose.translation.y = translation(1);
174  pose.translation.z = translation(2);
175  pose.rotation = tf2::toMsg(q);
176  pubPose.publish(pose);
177  }
178  scene->header.frame_id= "detection";
179  pcl_conversions::toPCL(ros::Time::now(), scene->header.stamp);
180  pub.publish(scene);
181  scene.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
182  scene_blob.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
183  }
184  cameraPose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
185  staticTrans.sendTransform(cameraPose);
186  ros::spinOnce();
187  }
188 
189  ros::spin();
190 }
